site_name: HAWKS RANCH PETTING ZOO L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1530 on
23-Aug-17.
Telephoned and talked to client. She would not be back for several hours.
